LanguageData.Messtin.label: 饭盒
LanguageData.Messtin.description: 架设一个饭盒，可以用于煮饭以及进行简单的烹饪。\n因为是最低限度的炊具的缘故，烹饪速度会降低30%。
LanguageData.Messtin_Blueprint.label: 饭盒 (蓝图)
LanguageData.Messtin_Blueprint_Install.label: 饭盒 (蓝图)
LanguageData.Messtin_Frame.label: 饭盒 (架设中)
LanguageData.Messtin_Frame.description: 架设一个饭盒，可以用于煮饭以及进行简单的烹饪。\n因为是最低限度的炊具的缘故，烹饪速度会降低30%。
LanguageData.IronPot.label: 锅
LanguageData.IronPot.description: 一个煮饭或是煮汤都很便利的燃料灶台。
LanguageData.IronPot_Blueprint.label: 锅 (蓝图)
LanguageData.IronPot_Blueprint_Install.label: 锅 (蓝图)
LanguageData.IronPot_Frame.label: 锅 (建造中)
LanguageData.IronPot_Frame.description: 一个煮饭或是煮汤都很便利的燃料灶台。
LanguageData.RiceCooker.label: 煮饭器
LanguageData.RiceCooker.description: 一个煮饭或是煮汤都很便利的烹饪台。\n因为配置了最新的烹饪器具，所以烹饪速度会提升30%。
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Blueprint.label: 煮饭器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Blueprint_Install.label: 煮饭器 (蓝图)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Frame.label: 煮饭器 (建造中)
LanguageData.RiceCooker_Frame.description: 一个煮饭或是煮汤都很便利的烹饪台。\n因为配置了最新的烹饪器具，所以烹饪速度会提升30%。
LanguageData.CookingTable.label: Cooking table
LanguageData.CookingTable.description: Cooking table for preparing.\nSpecializing in seasoning and food processing.
LanguageData.CookingTable_Blueprint.label: Cooking table(blueprint)
LanguageData.CookingTable_Blueprint_Install.label: Cooking table(blueprint)
LanguageData.CookingTable_Frame.label: Cooking table(building)
LanguageData.CookingTable_Frame.description: Cooking table for preparing.\nSpecializing in seasoning and food processing.
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar.label: Kineusu
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar.description: Kine(Pestle) and Usu(mortar) for making mochi. You can make mochi in large quantities.
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Blueprint.label: Kineusu(blueprint)
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Blueprint_Install.label: Kineusu (blueprint)
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Frame.label: Kineusu(building)
LanguageData.PestleAndMortar_Frame.description: Kine(Pestle) and Usu(mortar) for making mochi. You can make mochi in large quantities.
LanguageData.Nukadoko.label: Nukadoko
LanguageData.Nukadoko.description: A large bottle that can make a large amount of Nukaduke(rice bran pickles) that are preserved foods.
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Blueprint.label: Nukadoko(blueprint)
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Blueprint_Install.label: Nukadoko(blueprint)
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Frame.label: Nukadoko(building)
LanguageData.Nukadoko_Frame.description: A large bottle that can make a large amount of Nukaduke(rice bran pickles) that are preserved foods.
